table.name: amFeature
table.validscript: ' Numerical type and Min> Max -> invalid record if [seDataType] = 1 and [fMin] > [fMax] Then Err.Raise(-2009, "The value of the 'minimum' field must be less than the value of the 'maximum' field.") RetVal = FALSE Else RetVal = TRUE End If

field.name: TableName
field.mandatoryscript: ' Table mandatory for link feature If [seDataType] = 51 Then RetVal = True Else RetVal = False End If

field.name: dtObsolete

field.name: dtValid

field.usertypeformat: To assign|0|To be validated|1|Value accepted|2|Value rejected|3|Invalid|4|Obsolete|5

field.name: seFormType
field.readonlyscript: ' become readonly when the formular contains something ' 36 is the size of an empty formular RetVal = [lLen] > 36

field.name: TableName
field.readonlyscript: ' become readonly when the formular contains something ' 36 is the size of an empty formular RetVal = [lLen] > 36

table.name: amUnit
table.validscript: ' For a given dimension, only 1 Unit should have fConv=1 ' this one will be used as the pivot for conversions RetVal = TRUE if [fConv] = 1 Then if amDbGetLong("SELECT COUNT(1) FROM amUnit where fConv = 1 and Dimension = " & amSqlTextConst([Dimension]) & " and lUnitId <> " & [lUnitId]) > 0 then Err.Raise(-2009, "You cannot specify more than one pivot unit (conversion coefficient of 1) in the same dimension.") RetVal = FALSE end if end if

field.name: DstConvSym
field.default: if [fConv] = 1 then Retval = [Symbol] else if [Dimension] <> "" then RetVal = AmDbGetString("SELECT Symbol FROM amUnit where fConv = 1 and Dimension = " & amSqlTextConst([Dimension])) end if end if

field.usertypeformat: Time elapsed since start of task|0|% res. time|1|Time before end of task|2

table.name: amCatProduct
table.validscript: ' Check that we have 1 default option per group RetVal = TRUE if [lProdOptId] <> 0 and [bDefaultOption] <> 0 Then if amDbGetLong("SELECT COUNT(1) FROM amCatProduct WHERE lCatProductId <> " & [lCatProductId] & " AND lParentId = " & [lParentId] & " AND OptionGroup.lProdOptId = " & [lProdOptId] & " AND bDefaultOption <> 0 ") <> 0 then Err.Raise(-2009, "There must be one and only one default option per option group for a product.") RetVal = FALSE end if end if

table.name: amCatalogRef
table.validscript: If (Not(IsEmpty([dtEndValidity])) and Not(IsEmpty([dtStartValidity]))) Then If [dtEndValidity]<[dtStartValidity] Then Err.Raise(-2009,"The end date must not come before the start date") RetVal=FALSE Else RetVal=TRUE End If Else RetVal=TRUE End If

table.name: BienCont
table.validscript: If Not IsEmpty([dPlannedRemov]) and Not IsEmpty([dCntrIncluded]) and [dCntrIncluded] > [dPlannedRemov] Then Err.Raise(-2009, "The planned removal date (dPlannedRemov) must be greater than or equal to the date the asset has been added to the contract (dCntrIncluded).") RetVal = FALSE Else RetVal = TRUE End If

table.name: amCntrEmpl
table.validscript:
If Not IsEmpty([dPlannedEnd]) and Not IsEmpty([dStart]) and [dStart] > [dPlannedEnd] Then
Err.Raise(-2009, "The planned end date (dPlannedEnd) must be greater than or equal to the contract coverage start date (dStart).")
RetVal = FALSE
Else
RetVal = TRUE
End If
If Not IsEmpty([Reqline.CatalogRef.dtStartValidity]) and Not IsEmpty([dStart]) and [dStart] < DateValue([Reqline.CatalogRef.dtStartValidity]) Then
Err.Raise(-2009, "The start date (dStart) must be greater than or equal to the catalog reference start date (dtStartValidity).")
RetVal = FALSE
Else
RetVal = TRUE
End If
If Not IsEmpty([Reqline.CatalogRef.dtEndValidity]) and Not IsEmpty([dPlannedEnd]) and [dPlannedEnd] > DateValue([Reqline.CatalogRef.dtEndValidity]) Then
Err.Raise(-2009, "The end date (dPlannedEnd) must be smaller than or equal to the catalog reference end date (dtEndValidity).")
RetVal = FALSE
Else
RetVal = TRUE
End If
If Not IsEmpty([dStart]) and Not IsEmpty([Reqline.CatalogRef.dtEndValidity]) and [dStart] >= DateValue([Reqline.CatalogRef.dtEndValidity]) Then
Err.Raise(-2009, "The start date (dStart) must be smaller than the catalog reference end date (dtEndValidity).")
RetVal = FALSE
Else
RetVal = TRUE
End If

RetVal = FALSE ElseIf Not IsEmpty([dRemoved]) and Not IsEmpty([dIncluded]) and [dIncluded] >[dRemoved] Then Err.Raise(-2009, "The removal date (dRemoved) must be greater than or equal to the inclusion date (dIncluded).") RetVal = FALSE Else RetVal = TRUE End If

table.name: Contrat
table.validscript: If Not IsEmpty([dEnd]) and Not IsEmpty([dStart]) and [dStart] > [dEnd] Then Err.Raise(-2009, "The end date (dEnd) must be greater than or equal to the start date (dStart).") RetVal = FALSE Else RetVal = TRUE End If if [seType]=8 Then if [lParentId]<>0 AND [Parent.seType]<>7 Then Err.Raise(-2009, "A service level objective contract can only be linked to a service level agreement contract.") RetVal = FALSE Else RetVal = TRUE End if End If

field.default: If [seAdvArrears]=0 Then RetVal = AmDateAddLogical([dStart] , [tsBillCycDay]) Else RetVal = AmDateAddLogical([dStart] , [sePeriodicity]) RetVal = AmDateAddLogical(RetVal , [tsBillCycDay]) RetVal = AmDateAddLogical(RetVal , -86400) End If

field.name: RentStart
field.default: If [lCntrRentId] <> 0 Then RetVal = [CntrRent.dStart] Else RetVal = [Asset.dStartAcqu] End If

field.name: RateFactor
field.default: If [lCntrRentId] <> 0 Then RetVal = [CntrRent.pLRF] ElseIf [mValue] <> 0 Then RetVal=[mPayments]/[mValue] Else RetVal=0 End If

field.name: Period
field.default: If [lCntrRentId] <> 0 Then RetVal = [CntrRent.sePeriodicity] Else RetVal = 30 End If

field.name: lCostCatId
field.default: If [CntrRent.bUseCntrRentBudgCC] Then RetVal = [CntrRent.lCostCatId] Else RetVal = [Asset.Model.lCostCatId] End If

field.name: CostId
field.default: If [CntrRent.bUseCntrRentBudgCC] Then RetVal = [CntrRent.lCostId] Else RetVal = 0 End If

field.name: dRecalc
field.default: If [seAdvArrears]=0 Then RetVal = AmDateAddLogical([dStart] , [tsBillCycDay]) Else RetVal = AmDateAddLogical([dStart] , [sePeriodicity]) RetVal = AmDateAddLogical(RetVal , [tsBillCycDay]) RetVal = AmDateAddLogical(RetVal , -86400) End If

field.name: ProrateCalc
field.usertypeformat: Do not allocate or distribute payments to assets|0|Prorate and distribute payments to all assets|1|Prorate and distribute payments to a selection of assets|2|Allocate unit level payments to all assets|3|Allocate unit level payments to a selection of assets|4
field.default: ' if the contract is a lease contract, and the rent is a main rent, then ' the rent should be prorated on the assets If [bMainRent] <> 0 And [Contract.seType]=2 Then RetVal = 1 Else RetVal = 0 End If

link.name: RntAst
link.irrelevantscript: ' only relevant when prorate or charge on selected assets RetVal = ([seProrateRule] <> 2 And [seProrateRule] <> 4)

field.name: ProrateCalc
field.usertypeformat: Do not allocate or distribute payments to assets|0|Prorate and distribute payments to all assets|1|Prorate and distribute payments to a selection of assets|2|Allocate unit level payments to all assets|3|Allocate unit level payments to a selection of assets|4

link.name: ProrateAsset
link.irrelevantscript: ' only relevant when prorate or charge on selected assets RetVal = ([seProrateRule] <> 2 And [seProrateRule] <> 4)

table.name: amSplit
table.validscript: RetVal = TRUE If (Not(IsEmpty([dEnd])) and Not(IsEmpty([dStart]))) Then If [dEnd]<[dStart] Then Err.Raise(-2009,"End date must not precede the start date") RetVal=FALSE End If End If

table.name: Cout
table.validscript: If Not IsEmpty([dEnd]) and Not IsEmpty([dStart]) and [dStart] > [dEnd] Then Err.Raise(-2009, "The end date (dEnd) must be greater than or equal to the start date (dStart).") RetVal = FALSE Else RetVal = TRUE End If

field.name: Objet
field.usertypeformat: Purchase (Asset)|0|Training|1|Contract|2|Work order|3|Consumption|4|Purchase (Consumable)|5|Initial payment (Asset)|7|Initial payment (Contract)|8|Rent|9|License extension|10|Adjustment|11|Free|6|Project|12|Internal labor (Work order)|51|Internal labor (Ticket)|52|Subscription|55||
field.default: Const TCO_PURPOSE_TICKET = 52 If [lHistLineId] <> 0 Then RetVal = TCO_PURPOSE_TICKET Else 'Do not set by default for expense lines related to work orders RetVal = 6 End If

field.name: bValide
field.readonlyscript: if [seStatus] =1 AND [CurrentUser.bAdminRight]= 0 then RetVal = 1 end if

field.name: tsAccrualPeriod
field.default: Dim lCntrId As Long, lTraininglModelId As Long, lWOlModelId As Long, AssetdInstall As Double, AssetdDispos As Double, AssetdSchedRetire As Double, sePurpose As Long, AssetModeltsLifeExpectancy As Long, dBilling As Double, ProjectdStart As Double, ProjectdEnd As Double, ContractdStart As Double, ContractdEnd As Double lCntrId=[lCntrId] lTraininglModelId=[Training.lModelId] lWOlModelId=[WorkOrder.lModelId] AssetdInstall=[Asset.dInstall] AssetdDispos=[Asset.dDispos] AssetdSchedRetire=[Asset.dSchedRetire] sePurpose=[sePurpose] AssetModeltsLifeExpectancy=[Asset.Model.tsLifeExpectancy] dBilling=[dBilling] ProjectdStart=[Project.dStart] ProjectdEnd=[Project.dEnd] ContractdStart=[Contract.dStart] ContractdEnd=[Contract.dEnd] RetVal = amEvalScript("TcoLib", "lAccrualPeriod", "", lCntrId, lTraininglModelId, lWOlModelId, AssetdInstall, AssetdDispos, AssetdSchedRetire, sePurpose, AssetModeltsLifeExpectancy, dBilling, ProjectdStart, ProjectdEnd, ContractdStart, ContractdEnd)

field.name: BienId
field.default: retval=0 if [WorkOrder] <> 0 then retval=[WorkOrder.Asset] end if
field.irrelevantscript: RetVal = 1 if [sePurpose]=0 OR [sePurpose]=3 OR [sePurpose]=4 OR [sePurpose]=7 OR [sePurpose]=10 OR [sePurpose]=9 OR [sePurpose]=6 OR [sePurpose]=51 OR [sePurpose]=52 then RetVal = 0 end if

field.name: lCbkEventId
field.irrelevantscript: RetVal = 1 if ([bRecharge]<>0) then RetVal = 0 end if

field.name: ContId
field.irrelevantscript: RetVal = 1 if [sePurpose]=2 OR [sePurpose]=8 OR [sePurpose]=9 OR [sePurpose]=6 then RetVal = 0 end if

field.name: lITCGId
field.default: If (([Asset.PortfolioItem.seVIRole] = 1) AND ([Asset.PortfolioItem.seVIAvailable] = 1)) Then RetVal = AmDbGetLong("SELECT ResourceOfs.lClientId FROM amPortfolio WHERE (lAstId =" & [lAstId] & ") AND (#" & [dBilling] & "# > ResourceOfs.dtActiveStart) AND ((#" & [dBilling] & "# < ResourceOfs.dtActiveEnd OR ResourceOfs.dtActiveEnd IS NULL)) AND (ResourceOfs.seCRState = 3) AND (ResourceOfs.Client.seVIRole = 4)") Else RetVal = 0 End If

field.name: lProjId
field.default: retval=0 if [WorkOrder] <> 0 then retval=[WorkOrder.Project] end if
field.irrelevantscript: RetVal = 1 if [sePurpose]=12 OR [sePurpose]=6 OR [sePurpose]=3 then RetVal = 0 end if

field.name: FormaId
field.irrelevantscript: RetVal = 1 if [sePurpose]=1 OR [sePurpose]=6 then RetVal = 0 end if

field.name: IntervId
field.irrelevantscript: RetVal = 1 if [sePurpose]=3 OR [sePurpose]=6 OR [sePurpose]=51 OR [sePurpose]=52 then RetVal = 0 end if

table.name: amFinancialYear
table.validscript: If Not IsEmpty([dEnd]) and Not IsEmpty([dStart]) and [dStart] > [dEnd] Then Err.Raise(-2009, "The end date (dEnd) must be greater than or equal to the start date (dStart).") RetVal = FALSE Else RetVal = TRUE End If

table.name: amPeriod
table.validscript: If Not IsEmpty([dEnd]) and Not IsEmpty([dStart]) and [dStart] > [dEnd] Then Err.Raise(-2009, "The end date (dEnd) must be greater than or equal to the start date (dStart).") RetVal = FALSE Else RetVal = TRUE End If

table.name: amRelCCatNomen
table.validscript: If [lNomenclatureId] <> [BudgetCategory.lNomenclatureId] Then Err.Raise(-2009, "The end date (dEnd) must be greater than or equal to the start date (dStart).") RetVal = FALSE Else RetVal = TRUE End If

field.name: Rule
field.usertypeformat: Percentage of service availability|0|Length of service downtime|1|Others|99

table.name: amCbkRule
table.validscript: RetVal = TRUE if [dtRentStartDate]<[CbkSystem.dtStartDate] then Err.Raise(-2009, "The start date (dtRentStartDate) must be greater than or equal to the chargeback system start date.") RetVal = FALSE elseif (Not IsEmpty([CbkSystem.dtEndDate]) AND (IsEmpty([dtRentEndDate]) OR [dtRentEndDate]>[CbkSystem.dtEndDate]) ) then Err.Raise(-2009, "The end date (dtRentEndDate) must be less than or equal to the chargeback system end date.") RetVal = FALSE elseif Not IsEmpty([dtRentEndDate]) AND [dtRentStartDate]>[dtRentEndDate] then Err.Raise(-2009, "The start date must be less than or equal to the end date.") RetVal = FALSE elseif [Context]<>"amExpenseLine" AND [seAmountRule]=0 then Err.Raise(-2009, "The 'expense line' base amount cannot be used unless the context is 'expense line'.") RetVal = FALSE elseif [Query]<>0 then if [Query.TableName]<>[Context] then Err.Raise(-2009, "The filter table must be the same as the context of the rule.") RetVal = FALSE end if End if

field.name: AmountField
field.mandatoryscript: ' Amount Field is mandatory when Amount Rule is "Field" if [seAmountRule] = 2 Then RetVal = True Else RetVal = False End If

field.name: dMarkupCoef
field.irrelevantscript: if [seAmountRule]=0 or [seAmountRule]=2 then RetVal=0 else RetVal=1 end if

field.name: mFixedMarkup
field.irrelevantscript: if [seAmountRule]=0 or [seAmountRule]=2 then RetVal=0 else RetVal=1 end if

field.name: seAllocationRule
field.usertypeformat: Select from list|0|Select from database|1|Split billing|2|Calculate|3

field.name: sPriority
field.default: RetVal = 1+amDbGetLong("SELECT MAX(sPriority) FROM amCbkRule WHERE CbkSystem="&[CbkSystem])

field.name: TargetCostCenter
field.mandatoryscript: ' Target Cost Center is mandatory when Allocation Rule is "Designated Cost Center" if [seAllocationRule] = 1 Then RetVal = True Else RetVal = False End If

field.name: lAllocScriptId
field.mandatoryscript: ' Allocation Script is mandatory when Allocation Rule is "Script" if [seAllocationRule] = 3 Then RetVal = True Else RetVal = False End If

field.name: lAmountScriptId
field.mandatoryscript: ' Amount Script is mandatory when Amount Rule is "Script" if [seAmountRule] = 3 Then RetVal = True Else RetVal = False End If

field.name: lSplitRuleId
field.mandatoryscript: ' Split Rule is mandatory when Allocation Rule is "Split Billing" if [seAllocationRule] = 2 Then RetVal = True Else RetVal = False End If

field.name: lTargetCostCtrId
field.mandatoryscript: ' Target Cost Center Id is mandatory when Allocation Rule is "Select from list" if [seAllocationRule] = 0 Then RetVal = True Else RetVal = False End If

table.name: amCbkSystem
table.validscript: if (Not IsEmpty([dtEndDate]) AND [dtStartDate]>[dtEndDate]) then Err.Raise(-2009, "The start date must be less than or equal to the end date.") RetVal = FALSE else retval = TRUE End if

table.name: amCurRate
table.validscript: ' Rate between a currency and itself -> error if [lSrcCurId] = [lTargetCurId] Then Err.Raise(-2009, "You cannot specify the exchange rate from a currency to itself.") RetVal = FALSE Else RetVal = TRUE End If

field.name: BriefDesc
field.mandatoryscript: If [seNodeType] = 18 or [seNodeType] = 19 Then RetVal = 0 Else RetVal = 1 End If

table.name: amDownTime
table.validscript: If Not IsEmpty([dtEnd]) and Not IsEmpty([dtStart]) and [dtStart] > [dtEnd] Then Err.Raise(-2009, "The end date (dtEnd) must be greater than or equal to the start date (dtStart).") RetVal = FALSE Else RetVal = TRUE End If

field.name: seStatus
field.default: Retval=1 if (Not IsEmpty([dtEnd]) AND [dtEnd]<Now()) Then Retval=0 End if

field.name: seDelayType
field.usertypeformat: Duration|0|End of next business day|1|End of business week|2|End of business month|3

field.name: eType
field.usertypeformat: Time elapsed since opening ticket|0|% of resolution time|1|Time before resolution deadline|2

field.name: AssetId
field.default: If [lContactId] = 0 Then RetVal = 0 Else RetVal = AmDbGetPk("amAsset", "PortfolioItem.lUserId="+Str([lContactId])+" AND PortfolioItem.lParentId=0") End If

field.name: SeverityId
field.default:
' Max of gravity Dim lAstLvl As Long Dim lTypeLvl As Long Dim lLocaLvl As Long Dim lContactLvl As Long Dim lModelLvl as Long
lAstLvl = [Asset.Severity.lSeverityLvl] lTypeLvl = [ProblemClass.Severity.lSeverityLvl] lLocaLvl = [Asset.PortfolioItem.Location.Severity.lSeverityLvl] lContactLvl = [Contact.Severity.lSeverityLvl] lModelLvl = [Asset.Model.Severity.lSeverityLvl]
Dim lMaxLvl As Long lMaxLvl = lAstLvl If lTypeLvl > lMaxLvl Then lMaxLvl = lTypeLvl End If If lLocaLvl > lMaxLvl Then lMaxLvl = lLocaLvl End If If lContactLvl > lMaxLvl Then lMaxLvl = lContactLvl End If If lModelLvl > lMaxLvl Then lMaxLvl = lModelLvl End If
' Associated severity If lMaxLvl = lAstLvl Then RetVal = [Asset.lSeverityId] ElseIf lMaxLvl = lTypeLvl Then RetVal = [ProblemClass.lSeverityId] ElseIf lMaxLvl = lLocaLvl Then RetVal = [Asset.PortfolioItem.Location.lSeverityId] ElseIf lMaxLvl = lContactLvl Then RetVal = [Contact.lSeverityId] ElseIf lMaxLvl = lModelLvl Then RetVal = [Asset.Model.Severity.lSeverityId] Else RetVal = 0 End If

field.name: dWaitLimit
field.irrelevantscript: If 2<>[seType] OR 2=[seSuspLimitType] Then RetVal = TRUE Else RetVal = FALSE End If

field.name: seWaitType
field.usertypeformat: Date|0|Duration|1|Manual|2|Next business day|3|Next business week|4|Next business month|5

field.name: eWaitMode
field.usertypeformat: Freeze alarms only|0|Freeze all the escalation scheme|1

table.name: Bien
table.validscript: If Not IsEmpty([dEndAcqu]) and Not IsEmpty([dStartAcqu]) and [dStartAcqu] > [dEndAcqu] Then Err.Raise(-2009, "The end date (dEnd) must be greater than or equal to the start date (dStart).") RetVal = FALSE Else RetVal = TRUE End If

field.irrelevantscript: RetVal = 1 if [lModelId]<>0 then RetVal = (0=[Model.Nature.bSoftLicense]) else RetVal = (0=[PortfolioItem.Model.Nature.bSoftLicense]) end if

field.irrelevantscript: RetVal = 1 if [lModelId]<>0 then RetVal = (0=[Model.Nature.bSoftLicense]) else RetVal = (0=[PortfolioItem.Model.Nature.bSoftLicense]) end if

field.irrelevantscript: RetVal = 1 if [lModelId]<>0 then RetVal = (0=[Model.Nature.bSoftLicense]) else RetVal = (0=[PortfolioItem.Model.Nature.bSoftLicense]) end if

field.name: SoftLicUtilNb
field.irrelevantscript: RetVal = 1 if [lModelId]<>0 then RetVal = (0=[Model.Nature.bSoftLicense]) else RetVal = (0=[PortfolioItem.Model.Nature.bSoftLicense]) end if

field.name: NbConnexions
field.irrelevantscript: RetVal = 1 ' Must be connectable if [Model.Nature.seBasis] = 1 and [Model.Nature.bIsCnxClient] > 0 then RetVal = 0 end if

field.name: seCnxStatus
field.irrelevantscript: RetVal = 1 ' Must be connectable if [Model.Nature.seBasis] = 1 and [Model.Nature.bIsCnxClient] > 0 then RetVal = 0 end if

field.usertypeformat: Not defined|3|Per installation or utilization|4|Per named workstation|0|Per named user|1|Per number of concurrent accesses|2|By LPAR|5|By CPU speed|6|Per workstation (work and home)|7|Per site|8|OEM|9|By CPU|10
field.default: RetVal=[LicType.Code] if [LicType.Code]<>"0" AND [LicType.Code]<>"1" AND [LicType.Code]<>"2" AND [LicType.Code]<>"4" AND [LicType.Code]<>"5" AND [LicType.Code]<>"6" AND [LicType.Code]<>"7" AND [LicType.Code]<>"8" AND [LicType.Code]<>"9" AND [LicType.Code]<>"10" Then Retval=3 End if
field.irrelevantscript: RetVal = 1 if [lModelId]<>0 then RetVal = (0=[Model.Nature.bSoftLicense]) else RetVal = (0=[PortfolioItem.Model.Nature.bSoftLicense]) end if

field.name: NomPartage
field.irrelevantscript: RetVal = 1 ' Must be connectable if [Model.Nature.seBasis] = 1 and [Model.Nature.bIsCnxClient] > 0 then RetVal = 0 end if

field.name: NbConnMax
field.irrelevantscript: RetVal = 1 ' Must be connectable if [Model.Nature.seBasis] = 1 and [Model.Nature.bIsCnxClient] > 0 then RetVal = 0 end if

field.name: SoftSupport
field.irrelevantscript: RetVal = 1 if [lModelId]<>0 then RetVal = (0=[Model.Nature.bSoftLicense]) else RetVal = (0=[PortfolioItem.Model.Nature.bSoftLicense]) end if

field.name: SoftOS
field.irrelevantscript: RetVal = 1 if [lModelId]<>0 then RetVal = (0=[Model.Nature.bSoftLicense]) else RetVal = (0=[PortfolioItem.Model.Nature.bSoftLicense]) end if

field.name: VersionLevel
field.irrelevantscript: RetVal = 1 if [lModelId]<>0 then RetVal = (0=[Model.Nature.bSoftLicense]) else RetVal = (0=[PortfolioItem.Model.Nature.bSoftLicense]) end if

field.name: lLabelRuleId
field.irrelevantscript: RetVal = 1 ' Must be an asset and a device if [Model.Nature.seBasis] = 1 and [Model.Nature.bDevice] > 0 then RetVal = 0 end if

field.name: lLicCntrId
field.irrelevantscript: RetVal = 1 if [lModelId]<>0 then RetVal = (0=[Model.Nature.bSoftLicense]) else RetVal = (0=[PortfolioItem.Model.Nature.bSoftLicense]) end if

field.name: lLicTypeId
field.irrelevantscript: RetVal = 1 if [lModelId]<>0 then RetVal = (0=[Model.Nature.bSoftLicense]) else RetVal = (0=[PortfolioItem.Model.Nature.bSoftLicense]) end if

link.name: Link
link.irrelevantscript: RetVal = 1 ' Must be an asset and a device if [Model.Nature.seBasis] = 1 and [Model.Nature.bDevice] > 0 then RetVal = 0 end if

link.name: AssetSlots
link.irrelevantscript: RetVal = 1 ' Must be an asset and a device if [Model.Nature.seBasis] = 1 and [Model.Nature.bDevice] > 0 then RetVal = 0 end if

link.name: Pins
link.irrelevantscript: RetVal = 1 ' Must be an asset and a device if [Model.Nature.seBasis] = 1 and [Model.Nature.bDevice] > 0 then RetVal = 0 end if

link.name: Ports
link.irrelevantscript: RetVal = 1 ' Must be connectable if [Model.Nature.seBasis] = 1 and [Model.Nature.bIsCnxClient] > 0 then RetVal = 0 end if

field.name: SoftLicType
field.usertypeformat: Not defined|3|Per installation or utilization|4|Per named workstation|0|Per named user|1|Per number of concurrent accesses|2|By LPAR|5|By CPU speed|6|Per workstation (work and home)|7|Per site|8|OEM|9|By CPU|10

field.name: DeviceType
field.irrelevantscript: RetVal = 1 ' Must be an Asset and a Device if [Nature.seBasis] = 1 and [Nature.bDevice] = 1 then RetVal = 0 end if

field.name: Edition
field.irrelevantscript: Retval=Not ([Nature.seBasis] = 9 OR ([Nature.seBasis] = 1 AND [Nature.seOverflowTbl] = 3 AND [Nature.bSetUpMedia] = 0) OR [Nature.bSoftLicense] = 1 OR ([Nature.bSetUpMedia] = 1 AND [bCMService] = 1))

field.name: fRoundingQty
field.irrelevantscript: RetVal = 1 ' Must be a bulk asset or a Cable (length) if ([Nature.seBasis] = 1 and [Nature.seMgtConstraint]<>2) or ([Nature.seBasis] = 8) then RetVal = 0 end if

field.name: fUseQty
field.irrelevantscript: RetVal = 1 ' Must be a bulk asset or a Cable (length) if ([Nature.seBasis] = 1 and [Nature.seMgtConstraint]<>2) or ([Nature.seBasis] = 8) then RetVal = 0 end if

field.name: lPins
field.irrelevantscript: RetVal = 1 ' Must be an Asset and a Device if [Nature.seBasis] = 1 and [Nature.bDevice] = 1 then RetVal = 0 end if

field.name: pTaxRate
field.default: RetVal = 7.75/100 if [lParentId] <> 0 then RetVal = [Parent.pTaxRate] end if

field.name: seCbkType
field.usertypeformat: Direct cost|0|Shared cost|1|Cost not charged back|2

field.name: seContractType
field.usertypeformat: Other|0|Master lease|1|Lease schedule|2|Insurance|3|Maintenance|4|License|5|Blanket PO|6|Service level agreement|7|Service level objective|8|Internal Cloud Services|9|External Cloud Services|10|Mobile communication service|11

field.name: seDevSdType
field.irrelevantscript: RetVal = 1 ' Must be an Asset and a Device if [Nature.seBasis] = 1 and [Nature.bDevice] = 1 then RetVal = 0 end if

field.name: seDevType
field.irrelevantscript: RetVal = 1 ' Must be an Asset and a Device if [Nature.seBasis] = 1 and [Nature.bDevice] = 1 then RetVal = 0 end if

field.name: SoftLicType
field.usertypeformat: Not defined|3|Per installation or utilization|4|Per named workstation|0|Per named user|1|Per number of concurrent accesses|2|By LPAR|5|By CPU speed|6|Per workstation (work and home)|7|Per site|8|OEM|9|By CPU|10
field.default: RetVal=[LicType.Code] if [LicType.Code]<>"0" AND [LicType.Code]<>"1" AND [LicType.Code]<>"2" AND [LicType.Code]<>"4" AND [LicType.Code]<>"5" AND [LicType.Code]<>"6" AND [LicType.Code]<>"7" AND [LicType.Code]<>"8" AND [LicType.Code]<>"9" AND [LicType.Code]<>"10" Then Retval=3 End if

field.name: IconId
field.default: if [Parent.lIconId]<> 0 then Retval=[Parent.lIconId] Else Retval=amDbGetPk("amImage","Name='..\..\images\img16x16\DefaultModelIcon.bmp'") End if

field.name: lLabelRuleId
field.irrelevantscript: RetVal = 1 ' Must be a cable or (an asset and a device) if ([Nature.seBasis] = 8) or ([Nature.seBasis] = 1 and [Nature.bDevice] = 1) then RetVal = 0 end if

field.name: lUseUnitId
field.irrelevantscript: RetVal = 1 ' Must be a bulk asset or a Cable (length) if ([Nature.seBasis] = 1 and [Nature.seMgtConstraint]<>2) or ([Nature.seBasis] = 8) then RetVal = 0 end if

link.name: ModelSlots
link.irrelevantscript: RetVal = 1 ' Must be an Asset and a Device if [Nature.seBasis] = 1 and [Nature.bDevice] = 1 then RetVal = 0 end if

link.name: Ports
link.irrelevantscript: RetVal = 1 ' Must be connectable if [Nature.seBasis] = 1 and [Nature.bIsCnxClient] > 0 then RetVal = 0 end if

field.name: bConsumable
field.irrelevantscript: RetVal = (1<>[seBasis] OR 0<>[bHasSoftInstall] OR 0<>[bIsCnxClient] OR [bSoftLicense]<>0 OR [bDevice]<>0 OR [bSystem]<>0 or [bUserAccount]<>0)

field.name: bDevice
field.irrelevantscript: RetVal = (1<>[seBasis] OR [seMgtConstraint]<>2 OR [bSoftLicense]<>0 OR "amSoftInstall"=[OverflowTbl] OR [bConsumable]<>0 OR [bSystem]<>0 or [bUserAccount]<>0)

field.name: bHasSoftInstall
field.irrelevantscript: 'Relevant only if is not a bulk Asset RetVal = ([seBasis]<>1 OR [seMgtConstraint]<>2 OR "amSoftInstall"=[OverflowTbl] OR 0<>[bSoftLicense] OR [bConsumable]<>0 or [bUserAccount]<>0)

field.name: bIsCnxClient
field.irrelevantscript: 'Relevant only if is not a bulk Asset RetVal = ([seBasis]<>1 OR [seMgtConstraint]<>2 OR 0<>[bSoftLicense] OR [bConsumable]<>0 OR [bUserAccount]<>0)

field.name: bSoftLicense
field.irrelevantscript: ' irrelevant if we are software installation etc... RetVal = (1<>[seBasis] OR 0<>[bHasSoftInstall] OR 0<>[bIsCnxClient] OR "amSoftInstall"=[OverflowTbl] OR 0<>[bDevice] OR [bConsumable]<>0 or [bUserAccount]<>0)

field.name: OverflowTbl
field.default: If [seOverflowTbl] = 1 Then RetVal = "amComputer" Elseif [seOverflowTbl] = 2 Then RetVal = "amPhone" Elseif [seOverflowTbl] = 3 Then RetVal = "amSoftInstall" Else RetVal = "" End if
field.irrelevantscript:
Dim strBasis As String Dim strOverflows As String
If [seBasis] = 99 Then RetVal = 1 Elseif [seBasis] = 0 Then RetVal = 0 Else ' get the basis table name If [seBasis] = 1 Then strBasis = "amPortfolio" Elseif [seBasis] = 3 Then strBasis = "amWorkOrder" Elseif [seBasis] = 4 Then strBasis = "amContract" Elseif [seBasis] = 6 Then strBasis = "amTraining" Elseif [seBasis] = 8 Then strBasis = "amCable" Elseif [seBasis] = 9 Then strBasis = "amMonitoredApp" End if
' get overflow tables list strOverflows = amOverflowTables(strBasis) ' if this list is empty : field is irrelevant If strOverflows = "" Then RetVal = 1 Else RetVal = 0 End if End if

field.name: seCntrType
field.usertypeformat: Other|0|Master lease|1|Lease schedule|2|Insurance|3|Maintenance|4|License|5|Blanket PO|6|Service level agreement|7|Service level objective|8|Internal Cloud Services|9|External Cloud Services|10|Mobile communication service|11

field.name: seWorkOrderType
field.usertypeformat: Other|0|Install software|1|Authorize access to software|2|Remove software|3|Remove software authorization|4

link.name: Aggregations
link.irrelevantscript: If [seVIRole] = 4 Then RetVal = 0 Else RetVal = 1 End If

table.name: HDNews
table.validscript: If [dtEnd]<[dtStart] Then Err.Raise(-2009,"The end date must not come before the start date") RetVal=FALSE Else RetVal=TRUE End If

field.name: lColor
field.default: if [seSeverity] = 0 then RetVal = 65535 elseif [seSeverity] = 1 then RetVal = 65280 elseif [seSeverity] = 2 then RetVal = 16711680 end if

table.name: amAssignment
table.validscript:
RetVal = TRUE
If IsEmpty([dAssignment]) and [seAssignment]=0 Then Err.Raise(-2009, "This asset is no longer in stock and an assignment date (dAssignment) needs to be specified for it.") RetVal = FALSE End If
If ((([Model.Nature.OverflowTbl]="amComputer" And ([Model.Nature.seComputerType] = 1 OR [Model.Nature.seComputerType] = 2)) Or ([Model.Nature.bUserAccount]=1)) And [lParentId] <> 0 And [Parent.Model.Nature.OverflowTbl]="amComputer" And [Parent.Model.Nature.seComputerType] <> 2) Then Err.Raise(-2009, "A domain, group or user account can only be linked to a domain.") RetVal = FALSE End If
If (([Model.Nature.OverflowTbl]="amComputer" And ([Model.Nature.seComputerType] = 3 )) And [lParentId] <> 0 And [Parent.Model.Nature.OverflowTbl]="amComputer" And ([Parent.Model.Nature.seComputerType] <> 0 And [Parent.Model.Nature.seComputerType] <> 2)) Then Err.Raise(-2009, "A virtual machine can only be linked to a computer.") RetVal = FALSE End If
'|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- '| '| Checks for the Validity of Components and Component Groups which are part of teh Virtual Infrastructure '| '| 1) VI Availability can only be Yes for an Item with a VI Role '| 2) VI Availability can only be No for an Item without and non-Retired VI CR Relationsips '| 3) A Component Group must be 'In-Service' or 'Out-of-Service' if it has any 'In-Service' VI CR Relationships. '| '|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Const VI_CRREL_EXISTS As String = "SELECT Count(lClientResourceId) FROM amClientResource WHERE ( (seCRState > 0) AND (seCRState $1 $2) AND ((lClientId = $3) OR (lResourceId = $3)) )"
If (([seVIRole] = 0) AND ([seVIAvailable] = 1)) Then Err.Raise(-12007, "A Portfolio Item cannot be made Available to the Virtual Infrastructure without a VI Role.")
If ([seVIRole] > 0) Then
If ([seVIAvailable] <> 1) Then If (0 < AmDbGetLong(FormatResString(VI_CRREL_EXISTS, "<>", 5, [lPortfolioItemId]))) Then Err.Raise(-12007, "A Component Item or Group cannot be made Unavailable to the Virtual Infrastructure if there are VI CR Relationships to it with a non 'Retired' CR State") End If
If (([seVIRole] = 4) AND ([seCRState] <> 3) AND ([seCRState] <> 4)) Then If (0 < AmDbGetLong(FormatResString(VI_CRREL_EXISTS, "=", 3, [lPortfolioItemId]))) Then Err.Raise(-12007, "A Component Group cannot be in a CR State other than 'In-Service' or 'Out-of-Service' if there are VI CR Relationships to it with an 'In-Service' CR State") End If
End If
'|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

field.name: bUseQty
field.default: if [Model.Nature.seMgtConstraint]=2 OR [lModelId]=0 Then RetVal = 0 else RetVal = 1 End if

field.name: dAssignment
field.default: ' Do we assign it now ? if 1<>[seAssignment] then RetVal = AmDbGetDate("SELECT GetDate()") end if

field.name: Folder
field.irrelevantscript: if [Model.Nature.OverflowTbl] = "amSoftInstall" Or [Model.Nature.OverflowTbl] = "amComputer" Or [Model.Nature.bUserAccount] = 1 then RetVal = 0 else RetVal = 1 end if

field.name: fQty
field.default: RetVal = 1 if [Model.fUseQty]<>0 then RetVal = [Model.fUseQty] end if if 0<>[lAstId] then RetVal = (amDbGetDouble("Select SUM(fTotalQty) FROM amAsset WHERE lAstId=" & [lAstId])) - (amDbGetDouble("Select SUM(fQty) FROM amPortfolio WHERE lAstId=" & [lAstId])) end if

field.name: bEnStock
field.usertypeformat: In use|0|In stock|1|Retired (or consumed)|2|Awaiting receipt|3|Return for maintenance|4|Return to supplier|5|Missing|6

field.name: seCRState
field.usertypeformat: In Preparation|0|Awaiting Approval|1|Approved|2|In Service|3|Out of Service|4|Retired|5||
field.readonlyscript: If [seVIRole] = 4 Then RetVal = 0 Else RetVal = 1 End If
field.irrelevantscript: If [seVIRole] = 4 Then RetVal = 0 Else RetVal = 1 End If

field.name: lCostCatId
field.default: if [Asset.lPOrdLineId] <> 0 then retval = [Asset.POrdLine.lCostCatId] else RetVal = [Model.lCostCatId] end if

field.name: CoutId
field.default: if [lParentId]=0 Then RetVal = [User.lCostId] else RetVal = [Parent.lCostId] End if

field.name: LocaId
field.default: if (0<>[lParentId]) AND (0<>[Parent.lLocaId]) then RetVal = [Parent.lLocaId] elseif (0<>[lUserId]) AND (0<>[User.lLocaId]) then RetVal = [User.lLocaId] elseif (0<>[lStockId]) AND (0<>[Stock.lStockId]) then RetVal = [Stock.lLocaId] end if
field.irrelevantscript: 'Relevant when in stock or assigned RetVal = 0 if [seAssignment]<>0 and [seAssignment]<>1 then RetVal = 1 end if

field.name: StocId
field.irrelevantscript: 'Relevant when in stock or waiting to enter stock RetVal = 0 if [seAssignment]<>1 and [seAssignment]<>3 then RetVal = 1 end if

link.name: Slot
link.irrelevantscript: RetVal = 1 ' Must be an asset and a device if [Model.Nature.seBasis] = 1 and [Model.Nature.bDevice] > 0 then RetVal = 0 end if

link.name: Reservation
link.irrelevantscript: 'Relevant when in stock or waiting to enter stock RetVal = 0 if [seAssignment]<>1 and [seAssignment]<>3 then RetVal = 1 end if

table.name: Person
table.validscript: If (Not(IsEmpty([dHire])) and Not(IsEmpty([dLeave]))) Then If [dLeave]<[dHire] Then Err.Raise(-2009,"The hire date must not come after the exit date") RetVal=FALSE Else RetVal=TRUE End If Elseif (Not(IsEmpty([dEndValidity])) and Not(IsEmpty([dStartValidity]))) Then If [dEndValidity]<[dStartValidity] Then Err.Raise(-2009,"The end validity date must not come after start validity date") RetVal=FALSE Else RetVal=TRUE End If Elseif (0<>[bDepartment] OR [seLoginClass]=2) Then if [bAdminRight]=1 Then Err.Raise(-2009,"Administration rights cannot be assigned to a guest access type") RetVal=FALSE Else RetVal=TRUE End if ElseIf ( 0<>[lEmplDeptId] AND 0=[bDepartment] AND [UserLogin]<> "" AND [Name]<>"Admin" AND [bAdminRight]<>1) Then If [lDefMProfileId] <> 0 AND [lDefMProfileId]<>amDbGetLong("SELECT lMProfileId FROM amRelEmplMProf WHERE lEmplDeptId=" & [lEmplDeptId] & " AND lMProfileId=" & [lDefMProfileId]) Then Err.Raise(-2009,"The default user role must be declared in the list of available roles") RetVal=FALSE Else RetVal=TRUE End If Else RetVal=TRUE End If

field.name: bAdminRight
field.default: if (0<>[bDepartment] OR [seLoginClass]=2) Then Retval=0 End if

field.name: IconId
field.default: if [Parent.lIconId]<> 0 then Retval=[Parent.lIconId] Else if [bDepartment]=0 Then Retval=amDbGetPk("amImage","Name='..\..\images\img16x16\fille.bmp'") Else Retval=amDbGetPk("amImage","Name='..\..\images\img16x16\service.bmp'") End if End if

field.name: bAssignable
field.irrelevantscript: RetVal = TRUE If amIsModuleAuthorized("Helpdesk") Then RetVal = FALSE End If

field.name: IconId
field.default: if [lIconId]=0 then if [Parent.lIconId]<> 0 then Retval=[Parent.lIconId] Else Retval=amDbGetPk("amImage","Name='..\..\images\img16x16\service.bmp'") End if End if

field.name: SuperId
field.default: RetVal = amDbGetLong("SELECT lEmplDeptId FROM amEmplDept WHERE UserLogin = 'Admin'")

field.name: Nom
field.default: RetVal = "" if 0<>[lSocId] then RetVal = [Company.Name] end if

field.name: lSocId
field.default: if [lParentId] <> 0 Then RetVal = [Parent.lSocId] Else RetVal = 0 End if

table.name: amAbsence
table.validscript: If (Not(IsEmpty([dtBack])) and Not(IsEmpty([dtOut]))) Then If [dtBack]<[dtOut] Then Err.Raise(-2009,"The in date must not come before the out date") RetVal=FALSE Else RetVal=TRUE End If Else RetVal=TRUE End If

field.name: sSeq
field.default: If [lAstProjDescId] = 0 Then RetVal = 1 Else RetVal = AmDbGetLong("SELECT ISNULL(MAX(sSequenceNumber),0)+1 FROM amAstProjDesc where lAstProjDescId ="&[lAstProjDescId]) End If

table.name: amEmplProjDesc
table.validscript: If (Not(IsEmpty([dIncluded])) and Not(IsEmpty([dRemoved]))) Then If [dRemoved]<[dIncluded] Then Err.Raise(-2009,"The inclusion date must not come after the removal date") RetVal=FALSE Else RetVal=TRUE End If Else RetVal=TRUE End If

table.name: amFieldAdjustModel
table.validscript: RetVal = TRUE If 0=CountOccurences([TargetField], ".", "") Then Err.Raise(-2009, "The adjustment type must specify the link triggering the adjustment and the field to be adjusted.") RetVal = FALSE End If

field.name: ContextTable
field.default: RetVal = "" if [Model.Nature.seBasis]=1 then RetVal = "amPortfolio" elseif [Model.Nature.seBasis]=3 then RetVal = "amWorkOrder" elseif [Model.Nature.seBasis]=4 then RetVal = "amContract" elseif [Model.Nature.seBasis]=6 then RetVal = "amTraining" elseif [Model.Nature.seBasis]=8 then RetVal = "amCable" end if

table.name: amInventModel
table.validscript:
'Resolved implies either a final model to be selected, or to have all the data to generate one If [bResolved] <> 0 And [lModelFinalId] = 0 And ( [lModelTmpId] = 0 Or [lModelParentId] = 0 Or [ModelName] = "" ) Then Err.Raise( -2009, "The record can only be set to resolved (bResolved) if it is linked to a definitive model (ModelFinal) or if the temporary model (ModelTmp), parent model (ModelParent) and brand (Brand) links and name (ModelName) have values." )
'Check ModelFinal against ModelTmp If [lModelFinalId] <> 0 Then
'Always invalid when no Temporary Model selected If [lModelTmpId] = 0 Then Err.Raise( -2009, "A temporary model (ModelTmp) is required in order to create a definitive model (ModelFinal)." )
'Both model natures must create records in same overflow tables If [ModelTmp.Nature.seBasis] <> [ModelFinal.Nature.seBasis] Then Err.Raise(-2009, "The definitive model (ModelFinal) must have the same basic behavior (seBasis) as the temporary model (ModelTmp)." )
'Both model natures must create records in same basic and overflow tables If [ModelTmp.Nature.OverflowTbl] <> [ModelFinal.Nature.OverflowTbl] Then Err.Raise(-2009, "The definitive model (ModelFinal) must have the same extended behavior (OverflowTbl) as the temporary model (ModelTmp)." ) End If
RetVal = 1

table.name: Projet
table.validscript: If Not IsEmpty([dEnd]) and Not IsEmpty([dStart]) and [dStart] > [dEnd] Then Err.Raise(-2009, "The end date (dEnd) must be greater than or equal to the start date (dStart).") RetVal = FALSE Else RetVal = TRUE End If

table.name: ReqLine
table.validscript:
Dim l as integer RetVal = TRUE If [CatProduct]<>0 Then l = len([Model.FullName]) If left([CatProduct.Model.FullName],l) <> [Model.FullName] Then Err.Raise(-2009, "The product model (CatProduct.Model) and the request line model (Model) must be identical.") RetVal = FALSE End If End If If [CatalogRef]<>0 Then If [lModelId]<>0 Then l = len([Model.FullName]) If left([CatalogRef.CatProduct.Model.FullName],l) <> [Model.FullName] Then Err.Raise(-2009, "The product's catalog reference model (CatalogRef.CatProduct.Model) and the request line model (Model) must be identical.") RetVal = FALSE End If End If If [lCatProductId]<>0 And [CatalogRef.CatProduct] <> [CatProduct] Then Err.Raise(-2009, "The product's catalog reference (CatalogRef.CatProduct) and the product (CatProduct) must be identical.") RetVal = FALSE End If End If If [Model.Nature.seBasis]=3 And [Model.Nature.seWorkOrderType] = 1 And [UsedMedia.SoftInstall.lCanInstallId] <> [lUsedCanInstallId] Then Err.Raise(-2009, "The software package (UsedCanInstall) and the software package that the media can install (UsedMedia.SoftInstall.CanInstall) must be identical.") RetVal = FALSE End If If [bInstByDCIM] = 1 Then If [CatProduct.bCanBeInstByDCIM] = 0 Then Err.Raise(-2009, "In order to install a device through DCIM (bInstByDCIM = 1), a product (CatProduct) that can be installed through DCIM (bCanBeInstByDCIM = 1) must be linked to the request line.") RetVal = FALSE End If End If '=========================================== 'If request's bAutoRequest is false, ignore this verification, ortherwise must check to make sure that the linked model's field of bAllowAutoRequest must be true.
If ((RetVal = TRUE) AND ([lModelId] > 0)) Then RetVal = AmEvalScript("PurchaseOrderManagement", "VerifyRequestBaseLine", "", [lModelId], [Request.bAutoRequest]) If (RetVal = FALSE) Then Err.Raise(-2009, "The 'bypass request validation' option is not enabled for certain models of some assets contained in this request line.") End If End If

field.name: dtEnd
field.irrelevantscript:
If [Model.Nature.Code] = "SUBSCRIPTION" OR [CatProduct.Model.Nature.Code] = "SUBSCRIPTION" THEN
RetVal = 0
Else
RetVal = 1
End If

field.name: dService
field.default: if [lParentId] <> 0 And Not IsEmpty([Parent.dtService]) Then RetVal = [Parent.dtService] else RetVal = [Request.dtService] end if

field.name: fQtyReserved
field.irrelevantscript: RetVal = 1 'Is a consumption, an asset or a licence if ([Model.Nature.seBasis] = 1 and [Model.Nature.seMgtConstraint]<>2) or [Model.Nature.seBasis] = 4 then RetVal = 0 end if

field.name: LineDesc
field.default: if 0<>[lCatRefId] then Retval=[CatalogRef.Description] elseif 0<>[bCntrUtilization] then RetVal = amGetFieldLabelFromName("amReqLine", "bCntrUtilization") elseif 0<>[lModelId] then RetVal = [Model.Name] end if

field.name: LineNumber
field.default: RetVal = AmDbGetLong("SELECT IsNull(MAX(lLineNumber), 0)+1 FROM amReqLine WHERE lReqId="+Str([lReqId]))

field.name: lSequenceNumber
field.irrelevantscript: ' Must be a work order RetVal = (0<>[bCntrUtilization] OR 3<>[Model.Nature.seBasis])

field.name: fUnitCost
field.default: If [lCatRefId] <> 0 Then RetVal = [CatalogRef.fPrice] * (1-[CatalogRef.pDiscount]) Elseif [Model.lDefCatRefId] <> 0 Then RetVal = [Model.DefCatRef.fPrice] * (1-[CatalogRef.pDiscount]) End if

field.name: fUnitCostCur
field.default: If [lCatRefId] <> 0 Then RetVal = [CatalogRef.Catalog.Currency.Name] Elseif [Model.DefCatRef.Catalog.lCurId] <> 0 Then RetVal = [Model.DefCatRef.Catalog.Currency.Name] Else RetVal = amDefaultCurrency() End if

field.name: seSlot
field.usertypeformat: Is not a slot|0|Slot resolved|1|Slot not resolved|2

field.name: lCostCatId
field.default: if [lParentId] <> 0 Then RetVal = [Parent.lCostCatId] elseif [Request.lCostCatId] <> 0 Then RetVal = [Request.lCostCatId] else RetVal = [Model.lCostCatId] end if

field.name: CostId
field.default: if [lParentId] <> 0 Then RetVal = [Parent.lCostId] elseif [Request.lCostId] <> 0 Then RetVal = [Request.lCostId] end if

field.name: lLocaId
field.default: if [lParentId]<>0 AND [Parent.lLocaId]<>0 Then RetVal = [Parent.lLocaId] elseif [Request.lLocaId]<>0 then RetVal = [Request.lLocaId] elseif [lStockId]<>0 AND [Stock.lLocaId]<>0 then RetVal = [Stock.lLocaId] end if

field.name: ProjId
field.default: if [lParentId] <> 0 Then RetVal = [Parent.lProjId] else RetVal = [Request.lProjId] end if

field.name: lStockId
field.default: if (0<>[Location.lStockUsedId]) then RetVal = [Location.lStockUsedId] elseif [lParentId]<>0 AND [Parent.lStockId]<>0 Then RetVal = [Location.lStockUsedId] else RetVal = [Request.lStockId] end if
field.irrelevantscript:
If [Model.Nature.Code] = "SUBSCRIPTION" OR [CatProduct.Model.Nature.Code] = "SUBSCRIPTION" THEN
RetVal = 1
Else
RetVal = 0
End If

field.name: lUserId
field.default: if [lParentId] <> 0 Then RetVal = [Parent.lUserId] else RetVal = [Request.lUserId] end if

table.name: Request
table.validscript: if [seStatus]=14 AND amDbGetLong("SELECT Count(lReqLineId) From amReqLine where lReqId=" & [lReqId] & " AND seSlot=2")>0 Then Err.Raise(-2009, "You can not validate a request that contains unresolved request lines.") RetVal=FALSE Elseif [seStatus]>1 AND amDbGetLong("SELECT Count(lReqLineId) From amReqLine where lReqId=" & [lReqId] & " AND lChoiceOfId<>0")>0 Then Err.Raise(-2009, "You can not validate a request that contains unresolved options.") RetVal=FALSE Elseif ([seStatus]=1 AND [Model.bPubInSSC]=0 AND [bPubInSSC]=1) Then Err.Raise(-2009, "You can not publish a standard request in Service Manager's self-service catalog (bPubInSSC) if the standard request's model is not published in Service Manager (Model.bPubInSSC).") RetVal=FALSE Else Retval=TRUE End if

field.name: bPubInSSC
field.default: If [lModelId] = 0 Then if [bSoftPackage] = 1 Then RetVal = 0 Else RetVal = 1 End if Else RetVal = [Model.bPubInSSC] End If

field.name: bRequestable
field.default: If [seStatus] = 1 Then Retval=1 Else RetVal=0 End If

field.name: Number
field.default: if [bSoftPackage]=0 Then RetVal = "REQ" + AmCounter("amRequest_ReqNumber", 6) Else RetVal = "STP" + AmCounter("amRequest_ReqNumber", 6) End if

field.name: lLocaId
field.default: if 0<>[lUserId] AND 0<>[User.lLocaId] then RetVal = [User.lLocaId] else RetVal = [Stock.lLocaId] end if

field.name: RequesterId
field.default: If [seStatus] <> 1 then RetVal = AmLoginId() end if

field.name: lDuree
field.default: if [lModelId]=0 Then RetVal = 86400 Else RetVal = [Model.tsTrngDuration] End If

table.name: Intervention
table.validscript:
Dim bValid as boolean bValid = TRUE If (Not(IsEmpty([dtNotif])) and Not(IsEmpty([dtSchedFixStart]))) Then If [dtSchedFixStart]<[dtNotif] Then bValid=FALSE End If End If If (Not(IsEmpty([dtSchedFixStart])) and Not(IsEmpty([dtSchedFixed]))) Then If [dtSchedFixed]<[dtSchedFixStart] Then bValid=FALSE End If End If If (Not(IsEmpty([dtNotif])) and Not(IsEmpty([dtSchedFixed]))) Then If [dtSchedFixed]<[dtNotif] Then bValid=FALSE End If End If
If bValid=FALSE Then Err.Raise(-2009,"Notification (dtNotif=" & CStr([dtNotif]) & "), planned start (dtSchedFixStart=" & CStr([dtSchedFixStart]) & ") and planned end (dtSchedFixed=" & CStr([dtSchedFixed]) & ") dates must be ordered") Else If (Not(IsEmpty([dtNotif])) and Not(IsEmpty([dtActualFixStart]))) Then If [dtActualFixStart]<[dtNotif] Then bValid=FALSE End If End If If (Not(IsEmpty([dtActualFixStart])) and Not(IsEmpty([dtActualFixed]))) Then If [dtActualFixed]<[dtActualFixStart] Then bValid=FALSE End If End If If (Not(IsEmpty([dtNotif])) and Not(IsEmpty([dtActualFixed]))) Then If [dtActualFixed]<[dtNotif] Then bValid=FALSE End If End If If bValid=FALSE Then Err.Raise(-2009,"Notification (dtNotif=" & CStr([dtNotif]) & "), actual start (dtActualFixStart=" & CStr([dtActualFixStart]) & ") and actual end (dtActualFixed=" & CStr([dtActualFixed]) & ") dates must be ordered") End If End If Retval = bValid

field.name: dtActualFixed
field.readonlyscript: If [bHasSubTask] = 1 or [dtActualFixStart] = "" Then RetVal = TRUE Else RetVal = FALSE End if

field.name: dtActualFixStart
field.readonlyscript: If [bHasSubTask] = 1 Then RetVal = TRUE Else RetVal = FALSE End if

field.name: dNotif
field.default: Dim dtCurDate dtCurDate = AmDbGetDate("SELECT GetDate()") If [lAstId] = 0 Then RetVal = dtCurDate ElseIf [Ticket.dtOpened] < dtCurDate Then RetVal = dtCurDate Else RetVal = [Ticket.dtOpened] End If

field.name: dtResolLimit
field.default: If Not IsEmpty([Contract.tsWOResolTime]) then if [lCalendarId]<>0 then RetVal = AmDeadLine([Calendar.SQLName],[dtNotif],[Contract.tsWOResolTime]) elseif [Contract.lCalendarId]<>0 then RetVal = AmDeadLine([Contract.Calendar.SQLName],[dtNotif],[Contract.tsWOResolTime]) else RetVal = AmDateAdd([dtNotif],[Contract.tsWOResolTime]) end if end if

field.name: dtSchedFixStart
field.default: Dim dtCurDate dtCurDate = AmDbGetDate("SELECT GetDate()") if [lReqLineId] <> 0 then if Not(IsEmpty([ReqLine.dtService])) then if [ReqLine.dtService] < dtCurDate then RetVal=DateAddLogical(dtCurDate, 24&*60&*60&) else RetVal=[ReqLine.dtService] end if end if end if

field.name: seAutomationStatus
field.usertypeformat: To transmit|0|Transmission in progress|1|Transmitted|2|Execution in progress|3|Executed|4|Rejected|5

field.name: Type
field.default: If [lModelId] <> 0 Then RetVal = [Model.seWOType] ElseIf [lParentId] <> 0 Then RetVal = [Parent.seType] Else RetVal = 1 End if

field.name: Name
field.default: RetVal = [ReqLine.LineDesc] if RetVal = "" then RetVal = [Model.Name] end if

field.name: BienId
field.default: if [lParentId] <> 0 Then RetVal = [Parent.lAstId] Else RetVal = [Ticket.lAstId] End if

field.name: ContId
field.default: if ([POrdLine.CatalogRef.Catalog.Contract]<>0) Then Retval=[POrdLine.CatalogRef.Catalog.Contract] Elseif ([Asset.MaintContract]<>0) Then Retval=[Asset.lMaintCntrId] End if

field.name: LocaId
field.default: RetVal = [Asset.PortfolioItem.lLocaId] If RetVal = 0 Then RetVal = [ReqLine.User.lLocaId] If RetVal = 0 Then RetVal = [ReqLine.Request.User.lLocaId]

field.name: DemandId
field.default: If [lAstId] = 0 Then RetVal = [ReqLine.Request.lRequesterId] Else RetVal = [Asset.PortfolioItem.lUserId] End If

field.name: Name
field.default: if [Portfolio.Model.Nature.seComputerType]=1 then RetVal = "GRP" + AmCounter("amComputer_Group", 6) elseif [Portfolio.Model.Nature.seComputerType]=2 then RetVal = "DOM" + AmCounter("amComputer_Domain", 6) elseif [Portfolio.Model.Nature.seComputerType]=3 then RetVal = "VM" + AmCounter("amComputer_Vm", 6) elseif [Portfolio.Model.Nature.seComputerType]=4 then RetVal = "MD" + AmCounter("amComputer_MD", 6) else RetVal = "CPU" + AmCounter("amComputer_Name", 6) end if

field.name: TcpIpAddress
field.default: if [bGroup] <> 0 then RetVal = "" else RetVal = [Name] end if

field.name: TcpIpHostName
field.default: if [bGroup] <> 0 then RetVal = "" else RetVal = [Name] end if

field.name: sSeq
field.default: If [lModelId] = 0 Then RetVal = 1 Else RetVal = AmDbGetLong("SELECT ISNULL(MAX(sSequenceNumber),0)+1 FROM amModelPort where lModelId = "&[lModelId]) End If

field.name: ModeConn
field.default: If [lAstId] = 0 Then RetVal = "" Else RetVal = AmDbGetString("SELECT CnxMode FROM amModelPort WHERE lModelId = " & [Asset.lModelId] & " AND sSequenceNumber = " & [sSequenceNumber]) End If

field.name: Field1
field.default: If [lAstId] = 0 Then RetVal = "" Else RetVal = AmDbGetString("SELECT Field1 FROM amModelPort WHERE lModelId = " & [Asset.lModelId] & " AND sSequenceNumber = " & [sSequenceNumber]) End If

field.name: Field2
field.default: If [lAstId] = 0 Then RetVal = "" Else RetVal = AmDbGetString("SELECT Field2 FROM amModelPort WHERE lModelId = " & [Asset.lModelId] & " AND sSequenceNumber = " & [sSequenceNumber]) End If

field.name: Field3
field.default: If [lAstId] = 0 Then RetVal = "" Else RetVal = AmDbGetString("SELECT Field3 FROM amModelPort WHERE lModelId = " & [Asset.lModelId] & " AND sSequenceNumber = " & [sSequenceNumber]) End If

field.name: PortNo
field.default: If [lAstId] = 0 Then RetVal = "" Else RetVal = AmDbGetString("SELECT PortNo FROM amModelPort WHERE lModelId = " & [Asset.lModelId] & " AND sSequenceNumber = " & [sSequenceNumber]) If RetVal = "" Then RetVal = [sSequenceNumber] End If End If

field.name: sSeq
field.default: If [lAstId] = 0 Then RetVal = 1 Else RetVal = AmDbGetLong("SELECT ISNULL(MAX(sSequenceNumber),0)+1 FROM amPort where lAstId = "&[lAstId]) End If

field.name: Type
field.default: If [lAstId] = 0 Then RetVal = "" Else RetVal = AmDbGetString("SELECT Type FROM amModelPort WHERE lModelId = " & [Asset.lModelId] & " AND sSequenceNumber = " & [sSequenceNumber]) End If

field.name: lCabCnxTypeId
field.default: If [lAstId] = 0 Then RetVal = "" Else RetVal = AmDbGetString("SELECT lCabCnxTypeId FROM amModelPort WHERE lModelId = " & [Asset.lModelId] & " AND sSequenceNumber = " & [sSequenceNumber]) End If

field.name: lDutyId
field.default: If [lAstId] = 0 Then RetVal = "" Else RetVal = AmDbGetString("SELECT lDutyId FROM amModelPort WHERE lModelId = " & [Asset.lModelId] & " AND sSequenceNumber = " & [sSequenceNumber]) End If

field.name: lLabelRuleId
field.default: If [lAstId] = 0 Then RetVal = "" Else RetVal = AmDbGetString("SELECT lLabelRuleId FROM amModelPort WHERE lModelId = " & [Asset.lModelId] & " AND sSequenceNumber = " & [sSequenceNumber]) End If

field.name: bAutomaticDplmt
field.irrelevantscript: if [lModelId]<>0 Then RetVal = ([Model.Nature.bSetUpMedia] = 0 OR 0=[Model.bCMService]) else RetVal = ([PortfolioItem.Model.Nature.bSetUpMedia] = 0 OR 0=[PortfolioItem.Model.bCMService]) end if

field.name: bAvailableMedia
field.irrelevantscript: if [lModelId]<>0 Then RetVal = ([Model.Nature.bSetUpMedia] = 0) else RetVal = ([PortfolioItem.Model.Nature.bSetUpMedia] = 0) end if

field.name: bMandatoryDplmt
field.irrelevantscript: if [lModelId]<>0 Then RetVal = ([Model.Nature.bSetUpMedia] = 0 OR 0=[Model.bCMService]) else RetVal = ([PortfolioItem.Model.Nature.bSetUpMedia] = 0 OR 0=[PortfolioItem.Model.bCMService]) end if

field.name: bMissing
field.default: Retval=0 if [bCompact]=1 then if ([ParentPortfolio.seAssignment]= 6 OR [ParentPortfolio.seAssignment]=2) Then Retval=1 Else if ([PortfolioItem.seAssignment]=6 OR [PortfolioItem.seAssignment]=2) Then Retval=1 End if

field.name: lUseCount

table.name: amSoftLicCounter
table.validscript:
Dim bValidity As Long, lRc As Long
If (1=[bFamily] AND 0=[bAutomated]) Then Err.Raise(-2009, "Because the counter belongs to corporate compliance software management (bFamily), it must be editable through the 'Create a corporate compliance software management counter...' wizard (bAutomated).") bValidity=0 Else bValidity=1 End If
If [lCountId] <> 0 Then 'Test Previous lRc = AmDbGetLong("select COUNT(1) from amSoftLicCounter Curr, amSoftLicCounter TransferTo where TransferTo.lCountId=Curr.lPreviousId and Curr.lCountId=" & [lCountId] & " and Curr.lPreviousId <> 0 and ('" & [Context] & "' <> TransferTo.Context or " & [lQueryId] & " <> TransferTo.lQueryId)") If lRc > 0 Then bValidity=0 Err.Raise(-2009, "The 'scope of application' link (Definition) and 'group by' field (Context) must be identical for the counter and the counter it is linked to.") End If
'Test RecoverFrom lRc = AmDbGetLong("select COUNT(1) from amSoftLicCounter RecoFrom, amSoftLicCounter Curr where Curr.lCountId=RecoFrom.lPreviousId and Curr.lCountId=" & [lCountId] & " and RecoFrom.lPreviousId <> 0 and ('" & [Context] & "' <> RecoFrom.Context or " & [lQueryId] & " <> RecoFrom.lQueryId)") If lRc > 0 Then bValidity=0 Err.Raise(-2009, "The 'scope of application' link (Definition) and 'group by' field (Context) must be identical for the counter and the counter it is linked to.") End If
'Test UpgTo lRc = AmDbGetLong("select COUNT(1) from amSoftLicCounter Curr, amSoftLicCounter UpgradeTo where UpgradeTo.lCountId=Curr.lUpgToCntrId and Curr.lCountId=" & [lCountId] & " and Curr.lUpgToCntrId <> 0 and ('" & [Context] & "' <> UpgradeTo.Context or " & [lQueryId] & " <> UpgradeTo.lQueryId)") If lRc > 0 Then bValidity=0 Err.Raise(-2009, "The 'scope of application' link (Definition) and 'group by' field (Context) must be identical for the software upgrade counter and the counter to which rights are transferred.") End If
'Test UpgFrom lRc = AmDbGetLong("select COUNT(1) from amSoftLicCounter Curr, amSoftLicCounter UpgradeFrom where UpgradeFrom.lCountId=Curr.lUpgFromCntrId and Curr.lCountId=" & [lCountId] & " and Curr.lUpgFromCntrId <> 0 and ('" & [Context] & "' <> UpgradeFrom.Context or " & [lQueryId] & " <> UpgradeFrom.lQueryId)") If lRc > 0 Then bValidity=0 Err.Raise(-2009, "The 'scope of application' link (Definition) and 'group by' field (Context) must be identical for the software upgrade counter and the counter from which rights are received.") End If
'Test UpgsTo lRc = AmDbGetLong("select COUNT(1) from amSoftLicCounter Curr, amSoftLicCounter UpgTos where Curr.lCountId=UpgTos.lUpgToCntrId and Curr.lCountId=" & [lCountId] & " and ('" & [Context] & "' <> UpgTos.Context or " & [lQueryId] & " <> UpgTos.lQueryId)") If lRc > 0 Then bValidity=0 Err.Raise(-2009, "The 'scope of application' link (Definition) and 'group by' field (Context) must be identical for the counter and the software upgrade counters to which rights are transferred.") End If
'Test UpgsFrom lRc = AmDbGetLong("select COUNT(1) from amSoftLicCounter Curr, amSoftLicCounter UpgFroms where Curr.lCountId=UpgFroms.lUpgFromCntrId and Curr.lCountId=" & [lCountId] & " and ('" & [Context] & "' <> UpgFroms.Context or " & [lQueryId] & " <> UpgFroms.lQueryId)") If lRc > 0 Then bValidity=0 Err.Raise(-2009, "The 'scope of application' link (Definition) and 'group by' field (Context) must be identical for the counter and the software upgrade counters from which rights are received.") End If End If
If bValidity = 1 Then RetVal=TRUE Else RetVal=FALSE End If

field.default: If [bLicUpgrade] = 1 Then RetVal = 0 Else RetVal=1 End If

lCountReverseTransferableLink = AmDbGetLong("SELECT COUNT(1) FROM amSoftLicCounter WHERE lPreviousId = " & [lCountId])
RetVal = ([bLicUpgrade] = 0 AND [bHasPreviousCntr] = 0 AND lCountReverseTransferableLink = 0) OR ([bLicUpgrade]=1)

lCountReverseUpgLinks = AmDbGetLong("SELECT COUNT(1) FROM amSoftLicCounter WHERE lUpgFromCntrId = " & [lCountId] & " OR lUpgToCntrId = " & [lCountId])
RetVal = (1=[bType] AND 0=[bCountLic]) OR (lCountReverseUpgLinks = 0 OR [bLicUpgrade] = 1)

Dim lCountReverseUpgLinks As Long

RetVal = (1=[bType] AND 0=[bCountLic]) OR (lCountReverseUpgLinks = 0 OR [bLicUpgrade] = 1)

table.validscript: ' dtStart > dtEnd when applies -> invalid record If Not IsEmpty([dtStart]) and Not IsEmpty([dtEnd]) and [dtStart]>[dtEnd] Then Err.Raise(-2009, "The end of reservation date (dtEnd) must be greater than or equal to the reservation date (dtStart).") RetVal = FALSE ElseIf 0<>[lReqLineId] AND [ReqLine.fQty]<([fQty]+AmDbGetLong("SELECT SUM(fQty) FROM amReservation WHERE lReqLineId=" & [lReqLineId] & " AND lResaId<>" & [lResaId])) Then Err.Raise(-2009, "The quantity reserved exceeds the requested quantity.") RetVal = FALSE Else RetVal = TRUE End If

table.name: amAggregation
table.validscript:
Dim hTable As Long Dim hField As Long Dim lngFieldType As Long
hTable=AmGetTableFromName([ContextTable]) hField=AmGetFieldFromName(hTable, [FieldAQL]) lngFieldType=AmGetFieldType(hField)
Select Case(lngFieldType) Case 0: Err.Raise(-2009, "This field type is not compatible for aggregation.") RetVal = 0 '|Undefined Case 1: RetVal = 1 '|Byte Case 2: RetVal = 1 '|Short Case 3: RetVal = 1 '|Long Case 4: RetVal = 1 '|Float Case 5: RetVal = 1 '|Double Case 6: Err.Raise(-2009, "This field type is not compatible for aggregation.") RetVal = 0 '|String Case 7: Err.Raise(-2009, "This field type is not compatible for aggregation.") RetVal = 0 '|Time Stamp Case 8: Err.Raise(-2009, "This field type is not compatible for aggregation.") RetVal = 0 '|Bin Case 9: Err.Raise(-2009, "This field type is not compatible for aggregation.") RetVal = 0 '|Blob Case 10: Err.Raise(-2009, "This field type is not compatible for aggregation.") RetVal = 0 '|Date Case 11: Err.Raise(-2009, "This field type is not compatible for aggregation.") RetVal = 0 '|Time Case 12: Err.Raise(-2009, "This field type is not compatible for aggregation.") RetVal = 0 '|Memo Case Else: Err.Raise(-2009, "This field type is not known.") RetVal = 0 '|Unknown type End Select

table.name: amClientResource
table.validscript:
Dim strTemp As String
RetVal = 0
'|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- '| '| Check the CR Type to see if this CR Relationship is part of Virtual Infrastructure. '| If either the Client or Resource Role of the CR Type is > 0 then it is part of VI. '| '|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- If (([CRType.seVIClientRole] > 0) AND ([CRType.seVIResourceRole] > 0)) Then
'|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- '| '| Virtual Infrastructure CR Relationships have their own set of Validity Rules. '| '| 1) The "Active Start Date" must be populated '| 2) The "Active End Date" must be populated of the "CR State" is "Out of Service" or "Retired" '| 3) If the "Active End Date" is populated it must be < the "Active Start Date" '| 4) The "VI Role" of the "Client" must match the "Client Role" of the "CR Type" '| 5) The "VI Role" of the "Resource" must match the "Resource Role" of the "CR Type" '| 6) The Models of the "Client" and "Resource" must be "Compatible" '| 7) If the CR Relationship has an "In Service" CR state" and the "CR Type" has "Client Unicity" then '| there must not be another CR Relation for the Client with the same CR Type in the Active Date Range. '| 8) If the CR Relationship has an "In Service" CR state" and the "CR Type" has "Resource Unicity" then '| there must not be another CR Relation for the Resource with the same CR Type in the Active Date Range '| '|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Const CONFLICTING_CRR_CLT As String = "SELECT lClientResourceId FROM amClientResource WHERE (lClientId <> $1) AND (lResourceId = $2) AND (lCRTypeId = $3) AND (CRType.bClientUnicity = 1) AND (seCRState = $4) AND ($5)" Const CONFLICTING_CRR_RES As String = "SELECT lClientResourceId FROM amClientResource WHERE (lClientId = $1) AND (lResourceId <> $2) AND (lCRTypeId = $3) AND (CRType.bResourceUnicity = 1) AND (seCRState = $4) AND ($5)" Const CONFLICTING_DATES As String = "((dtActiveEnd > #$1#) OR (dtActiveEnd = ##)) AND ((#$2# > dtActiveStart) OR (#$2# = ##))"
If (IsEmpty([dtActiveStart])) Then Err.Raise(-12007, "The 'Active Start Date' must be populated for VI CR Relationships. lClientResourceId = " & [lClientResourceId]) If (([seCRState] >= 4) AND (IsEmpty([dtActiveEnd]))) Then Err.Raise(-12007, "The 'Active End Date' must be populated for 'Out of Service' and 'Retired' CR States. lClientResourceId = " & [lClientResourceId]) If (Not(IsEmpty([dtActiveEnd])) AND ([dtActiveEnd] < [dtActiveStart])) Then Err.Raise(-12007, "The 'Active End Date' must be greater than the 'Active Start Date'. lClientResourceId = " & [lClientResourceId]) If ([Client.seVIRole] <> [CRType.seVIClientRole]) Then Err.Raise(-12007, "The 'VI Role' of the Client must match the 'Client Role' defined for the CR Type. lClientResourceId = " & [lClientResourceId]) If ([Resource.seVIRole] <> [CRType.seVIResourceRole]) Then Err.Raise(-12007, "The 'VI Role' of the Resource must match the 'Resource Role' defined for the CR Type. lClientResourceId = " & [lClientResourceId]) If (([Client.seVIAvailable] <> 1) AND ([seCRState] <> 5)) Then Err.Raise(-12007, "If the Client is not VI Available then the 'CR State' cannot be anything other than 'Retired'") If (([Resource.seVIAvailable] <> 1) AND ([seCRState] <> 5)) Then Err.Raise(-12007, "If the Resource is not VI Available then the 'CR State' cannot be anything other than 'Retired'")
strTemp = "," & AmEvalScript("UtilLib", "AmGetCompatibleModels", "", [Client.lModelId], "", ",") & "," If (0 = InStr(0, strTemp, "," & [Resource.lModelId] & ",", 0)) Then Err.Raise(-12007, "The Models of the Client and the Resource are not Compatible. lClientResourceId = " & [lClientResourceId])
If ([seCRState] = 3) Then
If (([Client.seVIRole] = 4) AND (([Client.seCRState] <> 3) AND ([Client.seCRState] <> 4))) Then Err.Raise(-12007, "An 'In-Service' VI CR Relationship cannot be updated while 'In-Service' if the Client Aggregation is not 'In-Service'") If (([Resource.seVIRole] = 4) AND (([Resource.seCRState] <> 3) AND ([Resource.seCRState] <> 4))) Then Err.Raise(-12007, "An 'In-Service' VI CR Relationship cannot be updated while 'In-Service' if the Resource Aggregation is not 'In-Service'")
If ([CRType.bClientUnicity] = 1) Then strTemp = FormatResString(CONFLICTING_DATES, [dtActiveStart], [dtActiveEnd]) strTemp = FormatResString(CONFLICTING_CRR_CLT, [lClientId], [lResourceId], [lCRTypeId], 3, strTemp) strTemp = AmDbGetString(strTemp, "|", ",") If (strTemp <> "") Then Err.Raise(-12007, FormatResString("An 'In Service' CR Relationship of this Type already exists for this Resource with a different Client in the same 'Active Date Range'. lClientResourceId = $1 Existing = $2", [lClientResourceId], strTemp)) End If
If ([CRType.bResourceUnicity] = 1) Then strTemp = FormatResString(CONFLICTING_DATES, [dtActiveStart], [dtActiveEnd]) strTemp = FormatResString(CONFLICTING_CRR_RES, [lClientId], [lResourceId], [lCRTypeId], 3, strTemp) strTemp = AmDbGetString(strTemp, "|", ",") If (strTemp <> "") Then Err.Raise(-12007, FormatResString("An 'In Service' CR Relationship of this Type already exists for this Client with a different Resource in the same 'Active Date Range'. lClientResourceId = $1 Existing = $2", [lClientResourceId], strTemp)) End If
End If
RetVal = 1
ElseIf ([CRType.seType] <> 1) Then '|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- '| '| Validity for CR Relationships which are not part of the Virtual Infrastructure. '| '|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
If AmDbGetLong( "SELECT lClientResourceId FROM amClientResource WHERE lClientId = " & [lClientId] & " AND lSystemId = " & [lSystemId] & " AND lCRTypeId = " & [lCRTypeId] & " AND CRType.bResourceUnicity = 1 AND lClientResourceId <> " & [lClientResourceId] & " AND lResourceId <> " & [lResourceId] ) <> 0 Then Err.Raise( -2009, "The client already uses this resource type for this business service." ) ElseIf [bDefaultResource] = 1 AND AmDbGetLong( "SELECT lClientResourceId FROM amClientResource WHERE lClientId = " & [lClientId] & " AND lSystemId = " & [lSystemId] & " AND lCRTypeId = " & [lCRTypeId] & " AND bDefaultResource = 1 AND lResourceId <> " & [lResourceId]) <> 0 Then Err.Raise( -2009, "Same client linked with same business service using same relation ship has already a default resource defined." ) ElseIf [pFinImpact] + AmDbGetDouble( "SELECT SUM( pFinImpact ) FROM amClientResource WHERE lResourceId = " & [lResourceId] & " AND lClientResourceId <> " & [lClientResourceId] ) > 1 Then Err.Raise( -2009, "The total of the resource's financial impacts must not exceed 100%" ) Else RetVal = 1 End If
Else RetVal = 1 End If

field.name: bDefaultResource
field.default: if [CRType.bDefault] <> 1 Then RetVal = [CRType.bDefault] Else If AmDbGetLong( "SELECT lClientResourceId FROM amClientResource WHERE lClientId = " & [lClientId] & " AND lSystemId = " & [lSystemId] & " AND lCRTypeId = " & [lCRTypeId] & " AND bDefaultResource = 1 AND lResourceId <> " & [lResourceId]) <> 0 Then RetVal = 0 Else RetVal = [CRType.bDefault] End If End If

field.name: dtActiveEnd
field.mandatoryscript: If ([seCRState] = 4 OR [seCRState] = 5) Then RetVal = 1 Else RetVal = 0 End If

field.name: dtActiveStart
field.mandatoryscript: If ([CRType.seVIClientRole] + [CRType.seVIResourceRole] = 0) Then RetVal = 0 Else RetVal = 1 End If

field.usertypeformat: In Preparation|0|Awaiting Approval|1|Approved|2|In Service|3|Out of Service|4|Retired|5

table.name: amCRType
table.validscript: If (([seVIClientRole] > 0) OR ([seVIResourceRole] > 0)) Then Select Case ([Code]) Case "VI-(AN:MN)": RetVal = 1 Case "VI-(AN:M1)": RetVal = 1 Case "VI-(A1:MN)": RetVal = 1 Case "VI-(A1:PN)": RetVal = 1 Case "VI-(A1:P1)": RetVal = 1 Case "VI-(CN:A1)": RetVal = 1 Case "VI-(CN:AN)": RetVal = 1 Case Else: RetVal = 0 Err.Raise(-12007, "CR Types for the Virtual Infrastructure cannot be Created or Modified.") End Select Else RetVal = 1 End If

table.name: MasterProfil
table.validscript:
Dim strSetList as String Dim strSet as String Dim strMsg as String
RetVal = TRUE
strSetList = [ScreenSets] Do While( strSetList<> "") strSet = ExtractValue(strSetList, ",", "") if strSet<> "" AND not amIsScreenSet( strSet ) then strMsg = "The '$1' screen set does not exist. Check the 'Screen sets' (ScreenSets)field." strMsg = FormatResString(strMsg, strSet) Err.Raise(-2009, strMsg) RetVal = FALSE end if loop
